Package com.gsm.service

Interface UserService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl
    public interface UserService
extends org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
    Defines the contract for user management business operations. It also extends UserDetailsService to integrate with Spring Security.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      UserDto findById​(java.lang.Long id)
      Finds a specific user by their unique identifier.
      UserDto save​(UserDto userDto)
      Saves a user (either creates a new one or updates an existing one).
      java.util.List<UserDto> search​(java.lang.String keyword)
      Searches for users based on a keyword (e.g., username, phone number, department).
      void setActiveFlag​(java.lang.Long id, boolean status)
      Sets the active status (active or inactive) for a specific user.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService

        loadUserByUsername

    • Method Detail

      • search

        java.util.List<UserDto> search​(java.lang.String keyword)
        Searches for users based on a keyword (e.g., username, phone number, department).
        Parameters:
        keyword - The search term.
        Returns:
        A list of UserDto objects matching the search criteria.

      • findById

        UserDto findById​(java.lang.Long id)
        Finds a specific user by their unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the user to find.
        Returns:
        The UserDto object if found.
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if the user with the given ID does not exist.

      • save

        UserDto save​(UserDto userDto)
        Saves a user (either creates a new one or updates an existing one).
        Parameters:
        userDto - The UserDto object containing the data to save.
        Returns:
        The saved UserDto object, potentially with updated ID or audit fields.
        Throws:
        DuplicateResourceException - if a user with the same phone number already exists.

      • setActiveFlag

        void setActiveFlag​(java.lang.Long id,
                   boolean status)
        Sets the active status (active or inactive) for a specific user.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the user to update.
        status - The desired active status (true for active, false for inactive).
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if the user with the given ID does not exist.
